mapper.select: select emp_no, emp_name, emp_pino, emp_id, emp_email, emp_ph, emp_addr, hire_date, profilefile_name, emp_position from employees where order by emp_no
mapper.insert: insert into employees(emp_no, emp_name, emp_pino, emp_id, emp_email, emp_ph, emp_addr, hire_date, profilefile_name, emp_position) values(#{empNo}, #{empName}, #{emp_Pino}, #{empId}, #{empEmail}, #{empPh}, #{empAddr}, #{hireDate}, #{profilefile_Name}, #{empPosition})
